flightcontroller.title: 控制器
flightcontroller.subTitle: 控制器配置
flightcontroller.fcTypeDescription: 选择一个控制器，支持ardupilot和PX4
flightcontroller.internal_address_description:
This is the internal address raspberry uses for communication with Flight Controller.
Only change if you know what you are doing!

tips.1: gslink和控制器需要可靠共地，否则会影响串口通信.
tips.2: 如果使用USB线连接遇到问题，请确保已从gslink中移除所有其他USB设备.某些USB设备可能会导致冲突.

groundControlStation.title: 地面站
groundControlStation.subTitle: 添加地面站IP地址和端口.
groundControlStation.subTitle1: NOTE! 添加地面站IP地址仅适用于用UDP传输数据和图像

modem.title: 通信模块
modem.subTitle: 通信模块配置
modem.enableText: 启用通信模块用来连接公网.
modem.modelDescription: 选择合适的无线上网卡来连接LTE/4G网络
modem.hilinkInterfaceDescription: 设置hilink通信模块的接口，eth1或者eth0
modem.stickInterfaceDescription: 设置Stick调制解调器接口名.这通常是wwan0或ppp0.您可以通过按下面的network按钮看到接口名称
modem.apnDescription: APN是GSM、GPRS、3G或4G移动网络与另一个计算机网络(通常是公共Internet)之间的网关的名称
modem.internalAddressDescription:
USB调制解调器内部地址.USB调制解调器通常得到
cdc-wdm0.如果需要，您可以指定另一个地址.
modem.usernameDescription: 大多数运营商不需要任何用户名或密码，但有些可能.
modem.passwordDescription: 大多数运营商不需要任何用户名或密码，但有些可能.
modem.pinDescription: 除非您禁用了Pin授权，否则您需要使用PIN码

tips.title: 提示
tips.1: HiLink调制解调器的工作方式与以太网电缆相同.插入调制解调器后，gslink将立即联网.
tips.2: 您可以在此处找到所有支持的调制解调器 https://www.freedesktop.org/wiki/Software/ModemManager/SupportedDevices/

dynamicDns.title: DNS
dynamicDns.subTitle: 动态DNS配置
dynamicDns.aliasDescription: Dns Alias是您新创建的地址

tips.title: 提示
tips.1: 动态DNS是一种将Web URL链接到IP地址的方法.如果您想使用动态IP连接远程地面站，这很方便.

camera.title: 相机
camera.subTitle: 相机配置
camera.tcpHostDescription: 添加TCP主机IP地址.这应该是本机的IP地址.
camera.bitrateDescription: Default : 2000000 or 2Mbits/s. Use bits per second, so 10Mbits/s would be 10000000. For H264, 1080p30 a high quality bitrate would be 15Mbits/s or more. Maximum bitrate is 25Mbits/s (25000000), but much over 17Mbits/s won't show noticeable improvement at 1080p30.
camera.rotationDescription: Sets the rotation of the image in the viewfinder and resulting image. This can take any value from 0 upwards, but due to hardware constraints only 0, 90, 180, and 270 degree rotations are supported
camera.contrastDescription: Sets the contrast of the image. 0 is the default
camera.brightnessDescription: Sets the brightness of the image. 50 is the default. 0 is black, 100 is white
camera.autowhitebalanceDescription: Default Value: Auto. Modes for which colour temperature ranges (K) are available have these settings in brackets.
camera.framesPrSecondDescription: Default value = 20. At present, the minimum frame rate allowed is 2fps, and the maximum is 30fps
camera.cameraFlipDescription: 选择图像方向.水平或垂直翻转.
camera.httplivestreamDescription:
Recommended settings for In-Browser live stream
FPS => 10 - 15
Resolution => 960x540

tips.title: 提示
tips.1:
选择自定义通道并添加此代码以生成测试视频流.可以用于无相机情况下的测试，注意更改IP和端口以匹配您的设置。
gst-launch-1.0 videotestsrc ! x264enc ! video/x-h264, stream-format=byte-stream ! rtph264pay ! udpsink host=192.168.1.100 port=5600
tips.2: Mission planner和QGroundControl会自动检测端口5600上的视频流
tips.3:
在Windows计算机上接收UDP视频流，请安装gstreamer并使用此通道.请记住更改端口以匹配您的设置.
gst-launch-1.0 -v udpsrc port=5600 caps='application/x-rtp, media=(string)video, clock-rate=(int)90000, encoding-name=(string)H264' ! rtpjitterbuffer ! rtph264depay ! avdec_h264 ! videoconvert ! autovideosink sync=false
tips.4:
在Windows计算机上接收TCP视频流(仅限PiCam），请安装gstreamer并使用此通道.请记住更改端口和主机以匹配您的设置.
gst-launch-1.0 -v tcpclientsrc host='Pi-IP' port=5600 ! gdpdepay ! rtph264depay ! avdec_h264 ! videoconvert ! autovideosink sync=false

vpn.title: VPN
vpn.subTitle: 虚拟专用网
vpn.configurationDescription: 您的openvpn配置文件.请参阅openVPN帮助部分，了解如何生成/下载此文件

tips.title: 提示
tips.1: 国内用户适用蒲公英VPN，国际用户适用ZeroTier VPN.

license.title: 应用许可
license.subTitle: 许可证配置
license.supportText: 如果您需要任何进一步的信息，请随时与我们联系

applicationVersion.title: 软件版本
applicationVersion.subTitle: 软件信息
applicationVersion.upgradeSuccess: 安装完成后，请刷新界面

applicationSettings.title: 设置
applicationSettings.darkThemeDescription: Change between Light or Dark scheme
applicationSettings.serverMessagesDescription: Get real time messages from the server, such as undervoltage, CPU throttling. It will be highlighted in the header section
applicationSettings.serverPortDescription:
Change the default server port. Standard port 80.
Do not change if you dont know what you are doing!
applicationSettings.applicationLanguageDescription: 想要贡献? 读 这里
applicationSettings.resetLogfilesDescription: Logfiles will accumulate over time and it could be usefull to erase them if you troubleshooting an issue.
applicationSettings.resetDatabaseDescription: This will not erase userdata such as license, but all configurations will be lost.
applicationSettings.restoreDescription:
Restore database from an earlier backup. (.zip)
NOTE! All current config will be overwritten.

rebootNotification.title: 确认重启？
rebootNotification.content: 确认你已存储所有设置

shutdownNotification.title: 确认关机？
shutdownNotification.content: 确认你已经存储所有设置

customTerminal.title: 定制终端
customTerminal.helpText: example, type ls to list all files in the main directory

tips.title: 故障排除技巧
tips.1: 如果您遇到任何问题，请下载日志文件，然后与应用程序所有者联系

hostname.title: Hostname
hostname.description: A hostname is the label assigned to your RPI. Its used to distinguish one device from another on a network. You can access your RPI using the hostname instead of IP address. Default name is raspberrypi

interface.title: Interfaces
interface.description:
You will find all active interfaces below. Box with green outline is your default connection to the outer world.
Do not change any values while in flight, this might disconnect you from the vehicle.

route.title: Default network route
route.pre-description: Raspberry Pi is currently using gateway
route.post-description: to access the World Wide Web.
route.description:
You can specify another default interface from the dropdown bellow. Only physical devices can be selected, not VPN or other bridged interface.
Raspberry will still use other interfaces, but priority the one you select as first option.

wifi.title: WiFi Network
wifi.description: Disconnect wifi adapter temporarily. It will re-connect during next startup.
wifi.connecttext: Press the network name you want to connect to.

modal.title: Warning!
modal.description:
You are about to disconnect WiFI interface.
Make sure you are connected by other means if you want to stay connected.
Are you sure you want to proceed?

led.title: LED 控制
led.statusLedSubTitle: Select a status to enable the onboard status (green) LED
led.powerLedSubTitle:
Select a status to enable the onboard power (red) LED.
Note! Not all boards is equiped with power LED.

uavcast.title: Review LogFiles
uavcast.troubleshootingText: If you need any assistance or have a issue you want to address, then download application logfiles and submit them to

tips.title: Troubleshooting Tips
tips.1: If you encounter any problems then please Download log files and post them at
